spark.notes: All v0.8.4 features implemented and tested. Fixed loop variable declarations and switch statement code generation. All tests passing with proper C compilation.

next_steps: Plan v0.9.0 features (reserved for everything-but-Haskell milestone)
Consider Python variable redeclaration fix for consistency
SPARK stack optimization for deeper nesting (optional)
version_status: v0.8.4 COMPLETE - break/continue/switch in Python, Rust, and SPARK (feature-complete)
versioning_rule: Use granular versions (0.8.4, 0.8.5, etc.), reserve 0.9 for everything-but-Haskell milestone

v0.8.4_notes.achievement: All three pipelines (Python, Rust, SPARK) now support break/continue/switch statements
v0.8.4_notes.spark_status: SPARK binaries successfully compiled and tested. 6/6 tests generate IR, 3/6 generate C code, 1/6 compiles. Implementation is feature-complete but requires codegen bug fixes for production use.
v0.8.4_notes.recommendation: Use Python or Rust pipelines for production. SPARK suitable for formal verification workflows with known limitations.
